title: 1000 SQFT HISTORICAL CONDO GRADE Downtown Cherry Creek Washington Park
posting_body: Welcome to a Super Luxury Historical Huge Condo,
Message quick for fast personal showings!
This is an amazing and unique opportunity to rent in the Historic Norman Building, located across from Denver Country Club greens.
5 minutes from the Cherry Creek Shopping/Entertainment District, Washington Park and Downtown Denver.
The Norman, officially registered on the National Register of Historic Landmarks, boasts many fabulous architectural accomplishments and highlights.
The building is 6 story's high and was built in the Spanish Colonel Revival style.
Mahogany doors and wood trim have been meticulously preserved throughout.
The building is frequently praised as being one of the most beautiful and best un-touched examples of a luxury apartment building from the 20's and 30's.
The grounds are breathtaking - lush and serene and provide a sense of tranquility.
